alert.note: Alert for Dodge (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 8:15AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Dodge County through 900 AM CDT... At 814 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Owatonna, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Concord, Concord, County Roads 1 And 24, County Roads 20 And 5 and Berne. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized ponding water. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
